item.title: Version 2.0.3 - Fixes!
item.description:
Bug fixes!

  • Re-wrote the key capturing for the h letter so it works in pinyin and alike inputs when the app is open.
  • Fixed: when using the hold method for with a key, if the key gets held it writes the letter a bunch of time then excutes shortcut, now it dosent write the letter.
  • Made the hotkeys get smaller in the shortcut recorder and in the app cards for better looks.
  • Thanks for all of the supporters!

item.title: Version 2.0.1 - Polish and Stability Update
item.description:
‚ú® UI & UX Polish

  • Native macOS Icons: Shortcuts for files, folders, scripts, and macOS Shortcuts now use beautiful, native-style icons for a more integrated look.
  • Improved Hover Previews: Hovering over a long script in the shortcut list now shows much more of the script's content.
  • Better Button Hitboxes: Fixed an issue where some buttons (like in the recorder and segmented pickers) had small click areas. The entire button is now clickable.
  • Removed the redundant "Settings..." link from the main app menu for a cleaner experience.

üõ†Ô∏è Workflow Improvements & Fixes

  • Instant Hotkey Recording: Creating a new file, folder, or script shortcut now immediately prompts you to record a hotkey, streamlining the creation process.
  • Smarter Updates: Fixed a warning and improved the background update checker to use Sparkle's "gentle reminder" system correctly and respectfully.
  • Critical Stability Fix: Resolved a high-priority bug that could cause the app to crash when switching windows. The enhanced window switching is now both functional and thread-safe.

item.title: Version 2.0.0 - The Ultimate WarpKey Update!
item.description:
A New Identity

  • By popular request, WrapKey has been officially renamed to WarpKey! This update completes the transition.

‚ú® New & Exclusive Features

  • Revolutionary Window Switching: WarpKey can now instantly switch to applications on other desktops (Spaces) and even those in fullscreen mode. This is a game-changing feature i didnt see it implemented even in premium, paid window switchers, making WarpKey one of the most powerful switchers available.
  • Full Keyboard Navigation: You can now navigate lists like the App and Shortcut pickers using your arrow keys and select with the Enter key. Power users, rejoice!

üõ†Ô∏è Improvements & Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where some buttons (like in the recorder and segmented pickers) had small click areas. The entire button is now clickable.
  • Critical Fix: Reverted a change that broke the detection of Caps Lock and special function keys (like brightness/volume). These hotkeys now work reliably again.

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Bug Fix: Fixed an issue where some apps (especially those that hide in the menu bar) wouldn't open on the first launch. Triggering the shortcut a second time now correctly opens them.
  • New Feature: Quickly assign apps by triggering a global shortcut, which can be configured in settings.
  • New Feature: Added colorful themes. Select your favorite theme from the settings menu.
  • Improvement: The app now uses a standard macOS window instead of a floating panel.
  • Improvement: You can now assign shortcuts to trigger on a single click, a hold, a double-click, or a triple-click.

item.title: Version 1.0.6
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Fixed - Launch at Login: Resolved an issue that prevented the "Launch at Login" setting from working correctly.
  • Fixed - Brightness Keys: Addressed a bug where the functions row keys were not functioning.
  • Fixed - Caps Lock: Corrected an issue that caused the Caps Lock key to not work properly.

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • Bug Fixes: Addressed several bugs that caused the app to freeze, especially when using the cycle feature.
  • New Features: Added a Cheatsheet (adjust its shortcut in settings). Reworked the shortcut system: removed trigger/secondary keys in favor of assigning any shortcut to any app via the menu.

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

  • App Assignment Fixed: Resolved a critical bug where the hotkey for assigning new apps was not being recognized.
  • Improved Collision Logic: The app now correctly prevents a key from being used in multiple trigger groups simultaneously.

item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey 1.0.3

  • New Menu Bar Launcher: The menu bar icon now opens a quick-launch menu to run your shortcuts directly.
  • Hotkey-Optional Shortcuts: You can now create shortcuts without assigning a hotkey, making them accessible from the new menu.
  • Fixes & Polish: Corrected the app version display, made the author credit a colored link, and cleaned up the UI for a better experience.
